title: Numeric Differentiation Function
name: LGF_DifferenceQuotientFC
description: This function numerically differentiates a signal sampled equidistantly in time.

input.name: deltaT
input.description: Equidistant distance between two measured values. (e.g. 1s)

output.name: error
output.description: FALSE: No error TRUE: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

in/out.name: values
in/out.description: Values that will be included in the differentiation.

return_value.description: Void - Function has no return value

status_codes.16#8200: ERR_DELTA_T Error: Delta time `deltaT` must not be zero.
status_codes.16#8400: ERR_ARRAYS_DIFFERENT Error: The Array sizes are not equal.
